headline: Get a Head Start on the Fooday Revolution
headline_desc: As a qualified individual, you have the opportunity to be one of the first to invest in the future of restaurant review platform! By purchasing Food Coins during the pre-sale, you'll not only be supporting the development of the Fooday platform, but you'll also have the privilege of being one of the first to earn rewards for your contributions as a Foodie.

clam_holder_phase.title: CLAM Holder Presale
clam_holder_phase.desc: OtterClam members with $CLAM can purchase pFOOD with 10% OFF during phase 1. This is a limited-time offer, so be fast!

public_phase.title: Public Presale
public_phase.desc: By purchasing Food Coins now, you'll receive a promising price and be one of the first to join the Fooday community.

dialog.term: Hereby I acknowledge that one wallet can only deposit once during CLAM holder pre-sale and agree to the token purchase agreement and token sale term.

success.title: Fooday-licious!
success.desc: You've just taken a big bite out of the future of restaurant reviews by purchasing Food Coins!
success.hint: To stay on top of the latest Fooday news and updates, be sure to give us a follow. Let's make some tasty things happen together!
